aboutOpenTechAboutUsSectionContent:
No stress, No Hassles, we do the right job for your organization to provide efficient services and manpower solutions.
Open Technologies: is operating in the world of digital transformation and IT  Professional services, Manpower Solutions. We have offices in Saudi Arabia, UAE , Jordan and Egypt.
Established in 2018.Given our strategic Partnership with Tamkeen HR, we are leader in  providing IT and Professional Human Resources for our clients.Our services guarantee your business cost-saving, time-saving and less  complexity.We are continuously developing and improving our offering, to be closer to customers and listen to their needs.
whyChooseAboutUsSectionSubtitle: Just a few reasons why you choose Open Technologies and why our clients trust our services
ourVisionAboutUsSectionSubtitle: To become the supplier of choice and employer of choice, while providing value and quality to our community
ourVisionAboutUsSectionContent: Focus on white collar sourcing and managed shared services, with the help of digital transformation and state of the art processes and tools. Offering new channels to reach customers and innovative technologies, using best business practices.
ourMissionAboutUsSectionSubtitle: From the beginning, our mission is to provide our clients with professional consultancy services, Professional recruitment services in the following but not limited to : IT, Engineering, Project Management, Cost Management, HSE, Executives, and many more.
ourMissionAboutUsSectionContent:
We strive to bring their businesses to the next level of growth & efficiency.
We employee technology to reduce clients' burdens, we offer latest services in Business Process Outsourcing, and Managed Services.
aboutOurServicesContentBold: A leading employment services provider business, well-established company ensuring delivering the very best services to provide:
weHaveGlobalLocalNetwork: We have global & local companies' networks
lookAfterClients: We look after clients from International cooperation’s corporations to small independent businesses.
placedTalentsPositions: We placed many talents in permanent , and temporary contract positions.
professionalOutsourcingContent: Open Technology is an IT company specializing in recruitment of human resources of IT professionals from all nationalities . For private and government sectors that employ  skilled and professional  technical and specialized professions of both genders.
localTalentedDevelopmentContent: Part of our initiative to support vision 2030, we help organizations hire local talents, we have specific training programs designed to bring new talents up to speed, to start working from day 1.
businessProcessOutsourcingContent:
Business Process Outsourcing, this enables businesses to focus on core activities we act as an internal function and we manage business needs; examples of business process outsourcing is (Recruitment Process Outsourcing, Payroll, IT, Communication,…..)
Managed Service Provider, he we act as independent 3rd party offering services to the end client, we manage the team performance and implement SLAs with end client.
executiveResearchContent: We provide consultants for short term assignment to help your business needs, whether it was to scale certain capacities or to develop a new capability all together.
consultancyContent: We provide consultants for short term assignment to help your business needs, whether it was to scale certain capacities or to develop a new capability all together.
